title: Congress.gov Notifications Congress.gov Enhancements for November of 2025
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the Congress.gov enhancements for November of 2025.

Enhancement – Register of Debates

  • Look in the Debates of Congress section on the Browse page for links to the Register of Debates Page Headings and Index from the 18th Congress, 2nd Session through the 25th Congress, 1st Session (1824 to 1837).
  • Search Register of Debates page headings from the search bar by selecting Congressional Record before entering your search terms. Use the Debates of Congress Edition filter to narrow your results to only Register of Debates pages.
  • See About Debates of Congress and Coverage Dates to learn more.

Enhancement – Legislation – Search

  • Use the relatedBillChamberOfOrigin: field label to find measures with related measures from the specified chamber.

title: Congress.gov Notifications. Congress.gov Enhancements for August of 2025
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the Congress.gov enhancements for August of 2025.

New – House Roll Call Votes

  • House roll call votes from the 118th Congress (2023-2024) to the present are available to browse and search.
  • Use the House Roll Call Votes link in the Congressional Activity section of the Browse page to view a sortable list of votes from the 118th or 119th Congress.
  • Search House votes from the search bar or query builder.
  • Select a vote from the results list to

title: Congress.gov Notifications. Congress.gov Enhancements for July of 2025
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the Congress.gov enhancements for July of 2025.

Enhancement – Legislation – Download Results

  • You can choose to include the latest tracker stage when you download legislation search results.

Enhancement – CRS Products – Referenced Committee Reports

  • CRS Products with references to committee reports display the reports numbers in search results and in the overview of the product page.

title: Congress.gov Notifications. Congress.gov Enhancements for June of 2025
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the Congress.gov enhancements for June of 2025.

Enhancement – Library of Congress Documents – Browse

  • Open the Library of Congress Documents accordion on the Browse page to link to browse pages for Congressional Research Service products and Law Library of Congress legal reports.

Enhancement – Legislation – Download Results

  • When downloading legislation search results, you can choose Subject – Policy Area to include only the main subject assigned to each result. Check Legislative Subject terms when you want to include subject terms.

title: Congress.gov Notifications Register Now to Attend the Congressional Data Task Force Meeting on June 10, 2025
summary:
The Congressional Data Task Force will have their next public meeting on Tuesday, June 10, 2025, from 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM EDT. Listen to updates from various legislative branch partners. There will also be updates on recent Congress.gov enhancements.

 

Register at: https://usgpo.github.io/innovation/events/2025-06-10-CDTF/

title: Congress.gov Notifications. Congress.gov Enhancements for May of 2025
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the Congress.gov enhancements for May of 2025.

New – House Votes – API Endpoints

  • A beta version of House Votes endpoints is available in the Congress.gov API. Learn more about the Congress.gov API.

Enhancement – CRS Products – Search

  • Use the CRS Products search form to search by product number, author, topic and more.

title: Congress.gov Notifications. Congress.gov Enhancements for April of 2025
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the Congress.gov enhancements for April of 2025.

New – Historical Senate Executive Journals

  • Historical Senate Executive Journals from the 1st (1789 – 1791) through the 43rd Congress (1873 – 1875) are available to browse and search.
  • Find links to the Senate Executive Journal in the Congressional Activity section of the Browse page.
  • Using the search bar, select All Congresses and enter your word or phrase query. Check Senate Executive Journal under the Journals filter on your search results page.
  • Select a search result from the list to view a text version of the Senate Executive Journal page. Use the View Source Images link to display an image of the original print page.

Enhancement – CRS Products – Search

  • Filter search results from the CRS Products landing page search form by topic.
  • Search results

title: Congress.gov Notifications. Congress.gov Enhancements for March of 2025, Part 2
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the second installment of Congress.gov enhancements for March of 2025.

Enhancement – Debates of Congress – Download Results

  • Use the Download Results link on results for Annals of Congress and Congressional Globe searches to open a spreadsheet that includes title, URL, Congress, date and page for each result.

title: Congress.gov Notifications Register Now to Attend the Congressional Data Task Force Meeting on 3/11
summary: The Congressional Data Task Force will have their next public meeting on Tuesday, March 11, 2025, from 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM EST. Listen to updates from various legislative branch partners. There will also be updates on recent Congress.gov enhancements. Register at: https://usgpo.github.io/innovation/events/2025-03-11-CDTF.

title: Congress.gov Notifications. Congress.gov Enhancements for February of 2025
summary:
We are pleased to bring you the Congress.gov enhancements for February of 2025.

Enhancement – Congressional Globe

  • Access Congressional Globe daily PDFs from the Browse by Date page. Use the Congress selection list to view pages for the 23rd through 42nd Congress.
  • Search or browse the Index to the Appendix by session. Select a page number to view and download the appendix page image.
  • See About Debates of Congress and Coverage Dates to learn more.

title: My HealtheVet and Telehealth “make all the difference” for Veteran
summary: Veteran Jim Smith uses VA telehealth to manage his care and maintain his health so he can do his part to support fellow Veterans.

title: Breaking the myth: Understanding Veteran homelessness
summary: Learn how Veteran homelessness takes many forms, how you can help break the stigma around homelessness, and how you can help homeless Veterans access the resources they’ve earned and deserve.

title: Five essential suicide prevention resources
summary: In 2025, VA’s Office of Suicide Prevention shared resources, practical guidance, and insights for Veterans.

title: VA Research Wrap Up: New findings on Veteran mortality, weight loss and heart failure
summary: VA Research recently published three News Briefs highlighting findings on Veteran mortality, weight loss and heart failure.

title: VA Deputy Secretary discusses 2025 accomplishments, 2026 goals on Federal EHR Update
summary: The Honorable VA Deputy Secretary Paul Lawrence, Ph.D., appeared on VA's internal program, the weekly “Federal Electronic Health Record (EHR) Update” on Dec. 9. to discuss VA's 2025 accomplishments and goals for 2026.

title: A different type of service in a new uniform
summary: Veteran Manuel Calo, Jr. won the 2025 Peer Specialist of the Year for the West Palm Beach VA Healthcare System for his exceptional service to Veterans.

title: Mini horse, big mission
summary: Heroes come in all shapes and sizes, and sometimes they arrive as a mini horse.

title: Fisher House helps Veteran recover
summary: The Fisher House at VA Palo Alto health care has long provided a home away from home for families of Veterans receiving medical care.

title: Veteran’s health and confidence restored by VA wellness program
summary: Audrey Barrett’s journey shows how personalized support and wellness helps Veterans embrace a healthier, happier and more empowered life.

title: TSGLI celebrates 20 years of honoring severely injured service members
summary: The Servicemembers’ Group Life Insurance Traumatic Injury Protection (TSGLI) program is celebrating 20 years of providing short-term financial support to help eligible service members recover from traumatic injuries.

title: Year in Review: Federal job application changes
summary: In this edition of the Year in Review, we’re taking another look at 2025’s biggest federal job application changes and what they mean for job seekers.

title: Unseen heroes: Enhancing Veteran care at VA Augusta
summary: Dedicated teams work behind the scenes to improve safety and care quality, much like the agents in "Men in Black," ensuring Veterans receive the best care.

title: How the Veterans Crisis Line prevents Veteran suicide
summary: A clear overview of how Veterans and their supporters can use the Veterans Crisis Line for suicide prevention and ongoing support.

title: LiveWholeHealth #297: Reflections and intentions for 2026
summary: Each December, we often reflect on the year we've lived. As you head into 2026, take a few moments to get quiet and set your intentions for the upcoming year.

title: Pelvic health physical therapy restores quality of life for Veterans
summary: For a group of Veterans, a sensitive but common issue is being addressed, pelvic floor dysfunction. Pelvic health is part of overall wellness but often overlooked.

title: Veteran homelessness isn’t always visible
summary: Veteran homelessness isn’t always visible, and understanding its many forms can help connect those experiencing homelessness with vital VA support.

title: Supporting Veterans through evidence-based harm reduction
summary: By supporting evidence-based life-saving harm reduction services, VA is helping Veterans move towards healthier, more fulfilling lives.

title: Veteran and wounded dog found healing together
summary: A heartwarming story about how one Veteran and his Veteran dog are healing together, learning to heal physical and mental wounds.

title: Army Veteran: Cancer care at VA saved my life
summary: Army Veteran Darryl Lynch found expert cancer care and compassion from the same VA hospital where he served Veterans for nearly 20 years.

title: Airborne hazards: A Veteran toolkit for respiratory health
summary: Explore the Deployment Related Respiratory Disease Toolkit for Veterans on exposure to airborne hazards.

title: Make a difference at a rural VA
summary: Here's a look at Carl Vinson VA, located in rural Dublin, Ga., a small town with a big heart. See if a career serving Veterans here is right for you!

title: Five strategies for surviving the holidays
summary: The holidays can be joyous but also emotionally hard, especially if you’re already experiencing challenges. Learn some ways to navigate the season.

title: Kicking the habit: A smoking cessation success story
summary: Navy Veteran Frederick Hamilton quit tobacco after years, inspired by a VA smoking cessation support group. Now tobacco-free, he feels "like a million bucks."

title: VA Research Wrap Up: New findings on RSV vaccines, heart disease and homelessness
summary: VA Research recently published findings on respiratory syncytial virus vaccines, a potential heart disease treatment, and health care for homeless Veterans.

title: Use your phone for check-in, travel claims
summary: VA offers easy patient check-in and travel reimbursement by phone.

title: How do I know if prostate cancer screening is right for me?
summary: With the help of your VA provider, you can learn whether prostate cancer screening is right for you.

title: The history of addiction treatment at VA: Part 3
summary: Post-Vietnam VHA hospitals introduced new treatments for addiction, addressing the challenges faced by Veterans.

title: How VA’s Mindfulness Coach app helped a Veteran healing and find joy
summary: After loss and injury, an Army Veteran found healing through VA digital health tools, helping him rediscover purpose and strength.

title: From unemployable to Ph.D.
summary: How an Army Veteran rated for Individual Unemployability (IU) took control of his life, and now holds the title Doctor.

title: Cardiology care with heart: Meet a VA nurse
summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) knows that excellence in nursing is critical to the delivery of high-quality health care to our Veterans, so it’s unsurprising that we should find Ingra Wesbey, Registered Nurse (RN) elevating the standard of care each day at the Milwaukee VA Medical Center (VAMC).
